com.mobixell.xtt.ldap
Class LDAPServer

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      com.mobixell.xtt.ldap.LDAPServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class LDAPServer
extends Thread
implements Runnable

a very simple, multi-threaded HTTP server. Implementation notes are in LDAPServer.html, and also as comments in the source code

Version:
$Id: LDAPServer.java,v 1.9 2010/07/09 10:50:32 mlichtin Exp $
Author:
Gavin Cattell & Roger Soder
